questions.question: What is the name of Drake's dragon?

options.C: Worm

questions.explanation: Drake's dragon is named Worm, a large brown earth dragon.

questions.question: Where were Drake and Rory at the beginning of the story?

options.C: An empty classroom in the Castle of the Wizards

questions.explanation: Drake and Rory were in an empty classroom in the Castle of the Wizards, waiting for Jaina.

questions.question: What type of dragon is Vulcan?

options.C: Dream dragon

questions.explanation: Vulcan is Rory's fire dragon.

questions.question: Who is Wolfgang's father?

options.C: King Roland

questions.explanation: Wolfgang is the son of Zoltan, the wizard who transformed into a wizard dragon.

questions.question: What color does Worm's body glow when he transports?

options.C: Green

questions.explanation: Worm's body glows green when he uses his transportation powers.

questions.question: What is the name of the head wizard?

options.C: Kishar

questions.explanation: Jaina is the white-haired head wizard who wears an orange dress.

questions.question: What land is covered in snow where Wolfgang went?

options.C: Barga

questions.explanation: Barga is a cold land covered in snow where Wolfgang went to find his father.

questions.question: What type of dragon is Kinguk?

options.C: Water dragon

questions.explanation: Kinguk is an earth dragon, the same type as Worm.

questions.question: What does 'Kinguk' mean in Nuna's language?

options.C: Worm

questions.explanation: Nuna explains that 'Kinguk' means 'worm' in the language of her land.

questions.question: What was Maldred transformed into before being trapped in a bottle?

options.C: 100 flies

questions.explanation: Maldred was transformed into 100 flies and trapped in a red bottle guarded by the Naga.

questions.question: What plant did Nuna use to heal Kinguk?

options.C: Iceleaf

questions.explanation: Nuna used a plant called stinkweed to make tea that cured Kinguk of Zoltan's magic.

questions.question: What powerful dragon guards Maldred's bottle?

options.C: Vulcan

questions.explanation: The Naga, the Earthquake Dragon, guards the bottle containing Maldred.

questions.question: What happens when the Naga turns his eye to a place?

options.C: An earthquake happens

questions.explanation: When the Naga turns his eye to a place, he causes an earthquake.

questions.question: What color magic came from Wolfgang's wand when he gave Drake a coat?

options.C: Blue

questions.explanation: Blue magic sparks came out of Wolfgang's wand when he created a warm coat for Drake.

questions.question: Who is Rory's dragon?

options.C: Mamu

questions.explanation: Vulcan is Rory's fire dragon.

questions.question: What did Zoltan transform into?

options.C: A giant fly

questions.explanation: Zoltan transformed into a wizard dragon, a dragon with both dragon powers and wizard magic.

questions.question: How old is Wolfgang?

options.C: Eight years old

questions.explanation: Wolfgang tells his father 'I'm only eight' during their conversation.

questions.question: What color were Zoltan's dragon scales?

options.C: Black

questions.explanation: Zoltan's wizard dragon form had pink dragon scales covered with magical symbols.

questions.question: What color wings did Zoltan have as a wizard dragon?

options.C: Red

questions.explanation: Orange wings sprouted from Zoltan's back in his wizard dragon form.

questions.question: What stone did Drake wear around his neck?

options.C: A green dragon stone

questions.explanation: Drake wore a green dragon stone around his neck, which glows when dragons are near.

questions.question: Wolfgang said he had been getting teased ever since ---.

options.A: he failed his first magic test at wizard school
options.B: his dad turned into a dragon and flew past the castle
options.C: he accidentally set fire to the dining room
options.D: the other wizards learned he was from Gothica

questions.explanation: Wolfgang said 'Ever since my dad turned into a dragon and flew past the castle, everyone's been teasing me.'

questions.question: Wolfgang told Drake that if Zoltan's dream world plan didn't work, Zoltan ---.

options.A: would give up on freeing Maldred
options.B: knew about a secret doorway to the Naga in Barga
options.C: planned to attack the Dragon Islands directly

questions.explanation: Wolfgang said his dad 'knew about a secret doorway to the Naga in a land called Barga.'

questions.question: When Drake, Wolfgang, and Worm arrived in the ice cave, they first found ---.

options.A: the secret door to the Naga
options.B: a snow monster blocking their path
options.C: a girl kneeling next to a hurt dragon

questions.explanation: They found Nuna, a Dragon Master, kneeling next to her injured earth dragon Kinguk.

questions.question: Nuna healed Kinguk by ---.

options.B: asking Wolfgang to cast a healing spell
options.C: making stinkweed tea and singing a healing song
options.D: having Worm transfer energy to Kinguk

questions.explanation: Nuna made tea from stinkweed and sang a healing song from her people while Kinguk drank it.

questions.question: Drake told Wolfgang the dream amulet had the power to ---.

options.B: transform Zoltan back into a human
options.C: open the secret door to the Naga

questions.explanation: Drake explained that Kishar gave him the dream amulet, which 'has the power to transform Zoltan back into a human.'

questions.question: When the snow monster attacked, Nuna commanded Kinguk to ---.

options.B: crack the earth so the monster fell in
options.C: create an energy shield

questions.explanation: Nuna commanded 'Kinguk, crack the earth,' and the dragon opened a crack in the floor that trapped the snow monster.

questions.question: The dream amulet was destroyed when ---.

options.A: it fell into a crack in the ice
options.B: Zoltan hit it with red magic after it slipped from Drake's hands
options.C: Wolfgang accidentally broke it with a spell

questions.explanation: When Drake dropped the amulet, Zoltan cried 'Confectus!' and hit it with red magic, causing it to burst into pieces.

questions.question: When Jaina arrived at the cave, she immediately ---.

options.B: placed a dragon stone around Wolfgang's neck
options.C: used magic to close the secret door
options.D: called for the team of wizards

questions.explanation: Jaina jumped from Vulcan's back and placed a dragon stone around Wolfgang's neck, making him a Dragon Master.

questions.question: The secret door finally closed only after ---.

options.B: the Naga commanded it to close
options.C: Zoltan joined Jaina in saying the closing spell
options.D: Worm and Kinguk used their combined powers

questions.explanation: Jaina started the spell but it only worked when 'Zoltan joined her in saying the spell. Cloud ostium.'

questions.question: After breaking through the energy shield, the 100 mini-Maldreds ---.

options.C: merged back into one Maldred

questions.explanation: Each winged Maldred disappeared in an instant with 'poof, poof, poof' - they escaped by poofing away.

questions.question: Wolfgang's mother's death changed Zoltan because he ---.

options.B: started ignoring Wolfgang to study magic all the time
options.C: gave up magic completely

questions.explanation: Wolfgang said 'Dad started ignoring me to study magic all the time. He was always down in his workshop.'

questions.question: Drake and Worm were able to follow Wolfgang to Barga because ---.

options.C: Worm could follow Wolfgang's trail of magical energy

questions.explanation: Worm told Drake 'If we transport now, I can follow Wolfgang's trail of magical energy.'

questions.question: The secret door to the Naga was created ---.

options.A: as a trap for evil wizards
options.C: as a way to reach the Naga if the Dragon Islands are ever destroyed
options.D: to give wizards a shortcut to the temple

questions.explanation: Nuna explained the door 'was created years after the Temple of the Naga was built, as a way to reach the Naga if the Dragon Islands are ever destroyed.'

questions.question: Wolfgang used the dancing radish spell because ---.

options.A: it was the most powerful spell he knew
options.B: it was the first spell Zoltan ever taught him
options.C: Jaina told him to use it
options.D: it could break through Zoltan's shield

questions.explanation: Wolfgang said 'It's the first spell you ever taught me, Dad' when he cast the dancing radish spell.

questions.question: The dancing radish spell affected Zoltan because ---.

options.B: it broke his concentration on the door
options.C: it reminded him of happy memories with his son

questions.explanation: Zoltan stopped and remembered: 'That was so long ago... You were so good at magic, even at age five. I was so proud of you.'

questions.question: Kinguk escaped Zoltan's attack by ---.

options.C: diving headfirst into the cave floor and tunneling into the earth

questions.explanation: Before Zoltan's attack could hit Kinguk, 'she dove headfirst into the cave floor. She tunneled into the earth, escaping the attack.'

questions.question: Wolfgang convinced Zoltan to stop trying to free Maldred by ---.

options.B: using his dragon stone to share happy memories
options.C: promising him more power
options.D: having Jaina cast a calming spell

questions.explanation: Using his new dragon master connection, Wolfgang sent pictures with his mind of 'playing in the sand at the beach like we used to with Mom.'

questions.question: The red bottle holding Maldred broke when ---.

options.C: the Naga's final earthquake shook the cave and it tipped over

questions.explanation: During the Naga's strongest earthquake, 'the red bottle... tipped over and shattered into pieces.'

questions.question: Each mini-Maldred looked like ---.

options.B: a small fly with red wings
options.C: a cat-sized wizard with a red body, eye patch, and pointy beard

questions.explanation: Each mini-Maldred was 'the size of a cat' and 'a wizard with a red body, an eye patch, and a pointy red beard.'

questions.question: When Jaina and Zoltan combined their magic to create a shield, the colors were ---.

options.C: silver and pink

questions.explanation: Jaina's 'silver magic' combined with Zoltan's 'pink magic' to form the energy shield.

questions.question: Why couldn't Worm's energy bubble alone capture Zoltan?

options.A: Worm was too tired from transporting
options.B: The ice cave blocked earth dragon powers
options.C: The magical symbols on Zoltan's body made the bubble fizzle out
options.D: Zoltan was too fast to be caught

questions.explanation: When Worm tried to trap Zoltan, 'the magical symbols on the dragon's body glowed brightly, and the energy bubble fizzled out.'

questions.question: What made Zoltan's power shield weaken enough for Wolfgang to break it?

options.A: The Naga's energy interfered with his magic
options.C: The ice cave drained his power
options.D: Zoltan was putting all his energy into opening the door

questions.explanation: Wolfgang said 'He is putting all of his energy into opening the door. That could weaken the shield.'

questions.question: Why did Zoltan say he wanted so much power?

options.C: Because if he had more power years ago, he might have saved Wolfgang's mother
options.D: To get revenge on the wizards who expelled him

questions.explanation: Zoltan admitted 'Because I used to be weak... If I had more power years ago, I might have saved your mother.'

questions.question: Why was Jaina's suggestion for Wolfgang to become Zoltan's dragon master important?

options.A: It would automatically turn Zoltan human again
options.B: Wolfgang could use the mental connection to calm Zoltan's wild dragon energy
options.C: Dragon masters can control wizard dragons
options.D: It would give Wolfgang power over Zoltan's movements

questions.explanation: Jaina said 'Use your mind to connect to his mind. You can help him calm the wild dragon energy inside him.'

questions.question: What does the story suggest about wizards becoming dragon masters?

options.B: It is very rare for wizards to become dragon masters
options.C: All wizards eventually become dragon masters
options.D: Dragon masters are always stronger than wizards

questions.explanation: Jaina told Wolfgang 'It is very rare for wizards to become dragon masters. But now you can use magic' - showing it's unusual but possible.

questions.question: Why was the dream amulet the only way to transform Zoltan back?

options.A: It was created specifically for Zoltan
options.C: Wizard magic cannot undo the magic of the dream world
options.D: The Naga blessed it with special powers

questions.explanation: Jaina explained 'wizard magic cannot help your father... Drake's amulet is the only way I know of to undo the magic of the dream world.'

questions.question: What went wrong with Zoltan's spell to free Maldred?

options.B: It freed the Naga instead of Maldred
options.C: It made Maldred invisible
options.D: Instead of making one Maldred, it created 100 separate mini-Maldreds

questions.explanation: Zoltan's spell said 'One hundred flies are in here now, but Maldred there shall be' but instead each fly became a separate mini-Maldred.

questions.question: Why couldn't Nuna and Kinguk leave to help chase the Maldreds?

options.B: The Naga commanded them to stay
options.C: They are sworn to protect the secret door and cannot leave
options.D: Wolfgang needed them to guard his father

questions.explanation: Nuna said 'I wish I could help you go after Maldred, but Kinguk and I cannot leave the Naga door.'

questions.question: What is ironic about Zoltan's situation at the end of the story?

options.A: He became more powerful than Maldred
options.B: His son became his dragon master, reversing their roles
options.C: He lost all his wizard powers
options.D: He was trapped in a bottle like Maldred

questions.explanation: The father-son dynamic reversed: the child Wolfgang became the dragon master to his dragon-father Zoltan.

questions.question: Why did the team of wizards go to the Dragon Islands instead of Barga?

options.A: Jaina sent them there in case Wolfgang was wrong about his father's destination
options.B: They didn't know about the secret door in Barga
options.C: The Naga summoned them there
options.D: They were chasing a different villain

questions.explanation: Jaina said 'We sent them on to the Dragon Islands in case Wolfgang was wrong about where his father went.'

questions.question: What does Worm's reaction to seeing Kinguk reveal about earth dragons?

options.B: Earth dragons are enemies of each other
options.C: Worm had not seen another earth dragon since leaving King Roland's castle
options.D: Earth dragons cannot communicate with each other

questions.explanation: Worm said 'This is the first time I have seen another earth dragon since I was taken to King Roland's castle.'

questions.question: Why was Wolfgang conflicted about stopping his father?

options.A: He wanted the power for himself
options.B: He didn't believe his father was evil
options.C: He was afraid of the other dragon masters
options.D: He wanted to stop Zoltan but also didn't want him to get hurt

questions.explanation: Wolfgang said 'I don't want him to get hurt' and asked Drake 'You won't hurt him, will you?' showing his conflicted feelings.

questions.question: What can be inferred about why Zoltan became obsessed with Maldred?

options.B: He wanted power to cope with grief and feelings of weakness after his wife's death
options.C: The wizard council ordered him to study Maldred

questions.explanation: Zoltan admitted he felt 'weak' and believed more power could have saved his wife - his grief drove his obsession with gaining power through Maldred.

questions.question: What does the ending set up for future events?

options.C: 100 Maldreds are now loose in the world and must be stopped
options.D: Zoltan will return to being a normal wizard

questions.explanation: Jaina's final words were 'We have 100 Maldreds to stop' - setting up the next conflict.

questions.question: Why did Drake think telling Zoltan about the dream amulet was a mistake?

options.A: The amulet only worked if Zoltan didn't know about it
options.B: Knowing about it made Zoltan try to destroy it before Drake could use it
options.C: Jaina had forbidden them from mentioning it

questions.explanation: When Wolfgang mentioned the amulet, Drake thought 'Telling Zoltan about the stone wasn't part of the plan' - and Zoltan immediately destroyed it.

questions.question: What lesson does Wolfgang's success in reaching his father suggest?

options.A: Children should always obey their parents
options.B: Magic is always more powerful than emotions
options.C: Emotional connections and happy memories can be more powerful than force
options.D: Wizards are superior to dragon masters

questions.explanation: All the attacks failed, but Wolfgang's emotional appeal through shared memories succeeded in reaching his father.

questions.question: How did Rory and Jaina find the location of the secret door?

options.A: Wolfgang sent them a magical message
options.C: Jaina found it in the castle library after Rory told her about Barga

questions.explanation: Rory said 'I told Jaina' about Barga, and 'she found the location of the secret door in the castle library.'

questions.question: What does Nuna's healing song suggest about her culture?

options.B: Her people don't trust wizard magic
options.C: Her people combine traditional practices like songs with other healing methods
options.D: Her people are all dragon masters

questions.explanation: Nuna explained 'it is a song for healing that my people sing when someone is ill. I think it might help' - combining traditional song with the stinkweed medicine.

questions.question: Why couldn't even two powerful wizards' combined magic stop the 100 Maldreds?

options.A: The Maldreds had absorbed the Naga's power
options.B: Zoltan was secretly helping the Maldreds
options.C: The ice cave weakened their magic
options.D: The collective power of 100 Maldreds was too strong

questions.explanation: Drake realized 'Not even the magic of two powerful wizards can stop 100 Maldreds' - their combined numbers overwhelmed the shield.

questions.question: What does Zoltan's apology to Wolfgang reveal about his character?

options.A: He was only pretending to change
options.C: He was never truly evil, just lost in grief and obsession
options.D: He wanted Wolfgang to join Maldred

questions.explanation: Zoltan apologized saying 'I lost my focus when your mother died. I should have focused all of my energies on you' - showing grief, not evil, drove his actions.
